articles.title: Video shows customer at boba tea shop dropping lint in his own drink before leaving bad review - Daily Mail
articles.description: A customer who left a negative review for a tea shop in San Francisco's Bay Area was outed by video that showed him dropping lint into his own drink before sharing his one-star rating.
articles.content:

articles.title: Iraq to ask Turkey to restart northern oil exports after Kurdish deal - Reuters
articles.description: Iraq's federal government and the Kurdistan Regional Government (KRG) have reached an initial agreement to restart northern oil exports this week, a KRG spokesman said on Sunday, and Baghdad will write to Turkey to request a resumption in pipeline flows.
